titles.title: Bryce Raynor Act of 2020
Bryce Raynor Act of 2020
Bryce Raynor Act of 2020

A bill to direct the Secretary of Labor to promulgate an occupational safety and health standard that requires covered employers to protect employees from injury and death related to grease trap manholes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
